column1: Kata Robata////- Although $17 seems like a lot to pay for skewers of beef
column2: in my opinion I am shocked it isn't priced $30
column3: ITS THAT GOOD. I have several times told people this is the by far the best thing I have ever eaten in my life
column4: and I still stand by that. It melts in your mouth
column5: and you will want to order another order of them.
